definitions: To clean or dry (something) by rubbing its surface with a cloth, paper, or one's hand.
To remove (dirt, liquid, etc.) from a surface by rubbing.
To pass a cloth, hand, or other object over (a surface or object), typically to clean or dry it.
To erase or remove (data) from a computer or other electronic device.
examples: Wipe the sweat from your brow.
Wipe the hard drive before selling it.
